name: Food Court
description:
Have you ever stared longingly into a hamburger's patty and wished it could hold you in its buns?

Have you ever known a sundae to change the very person you thought you were?

Have you ever want to just get up on a cupcake and start kissing it passionately with tongue(s)?

Well play Food Court! It might have some of that.

DOES NOT WORK IN FIREFOX. TRY CHROME. I'M SORRY.

-----------------------------------------------

Created by Mindy Doyle and Shane Doyle

Twitters: @mindysoung and @PeteGrammarman and @CakenapGames

Go to startledstar.com for more artwork by Mindy!

You can also play it here: cakenaps.com/foodcourt

All Music from http://murasato.catfood.jp/bgm.php
